title: I have an idea riot!
body:
Problem: People trolling in champion select so that they force others to dodge.

My Solution: If you guys implement a "quit" option in champion it could take the team that dodged to a report lobby where trollers can be reported. Repetitive trolling behaviour should result in loss of lp. I understand this way may be very un-user-friendly and/or may violate the ranking system, but this issue needs to be addressed because I need to stop losing lp from dodging and I need justice if it happens! 

Finally, I'm sure you guys will have better ideas to solve this problem but pleaseeee solve it!
